title: [Bug]: repo is just throwing out 403 forbidden errors
body:
### Can you reproduce this bug in the website/PWA?

Not applicable

### Describe the bug

i don't know if this is the right place to raise this but the rpm repository seems to have permission issues

### What package are you using?

rpm

### Version

latest

### Reproduction steps

```markdown
1. curl https://repo.teamsforlinux.de/teams-for-linux.asc - OK
2. curl https://repo.teamsforlinux.de/rpm/teams-for-linux.repo - 403 FORBIDDEN
3. browsing https://repo.teamsforlinux.de/rpm/repodata/ - 403 FORBIDDEN
...
```

### Expected Behavior

```markdown
- able to download the .repo file
- able to browse https://repo.teamsforlinux.de/rpm/repodata/
```

### Debug

```markdown
not applicable
```

### Additional context

_No response_
